title: Alex Moffat | Trump Lies and Stonewalls as Impeachment Inquiry Ramps Up: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at White House officials stonewalling the impeachment inquiry as Republicans shift their defense of the President.

Then, Seth talks to SNL's Alex Moffat. Alex also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night's Kevin Miller.
